full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BTZAN GYI TSOGS LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL GNOD 'TSE ZHI BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES @005B BTZAN GYIS SDE TSOGS LAS BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL MDOR BSDUS SU BKOD PA GNOD 'TSE ZHI BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DENG SANG BDAG 'DRAI SKYE BO'I RNAMS NGA RGYAL LA SOGS NYON MONGS SHAS CHEN GOMS SHING SDIGS PA MI DGE BA'I LAS SNA TSOGS 'JOM MED DU BYAS SHING BSAGS PA LA, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN BSRUNG BKA' SDOD BTZAN GYIS TSOGS RNAMS KYIS NAD YAMS SOGS SOGS MI 'DOD RKYEN NGAN SNA TSOGS PA'I CHAD PA PHOG PA DANG, ,SKABS 'GAR RANG CAG GI RNAM RTOG NYON MONGS GOMS SHING SDIG LAS 'JOM MED DU BGYIS PA'I 'BRAS BU BTZAN GYIS RNAM PAR SHAR NAS GNOD PA SNA TSOGS GTONG BAR MKHAS GRUB DAM PA RNAMS KYIS GSUNGS PA MTHONG NAS, BTZAN MDOS SOGS GTO CHE BA RNAMS BSGRUB MI NUS PA 'BYOR BA DMAN PA DANG HA CAN BREL RUS RNAMS SU 'DI TZAM GYIS KYANG GO COD PA DANG PHAN PA 'GYUR SRID SNYAM STE, ,RDO RJE DBANG CHEN RTZAL GYIS DAM PA'I GSUNG DANG GUR BSGRIGS TE SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
